column1: HEGIFT_You do not have any gifts yet.

column2: Create and Send Gift to Your Friends
Select Friends and Send Your Gift
Send Virtual Gifts to Your Friends.

column1: This is the browse page for Virtual Gifts
column2: Browse virtual gifts and send them to your friends.
Create your own gift and send it to your friends

column1: HEGIFT_You can create and send Own Gift. Gifts are photo, audio, and video.
column2: Please select type of your gift below, you can send a photo, audio or video gift to your friends:
You can surprise your friends by sending a funny, family or your photo. Send a Photo-Gift to your friends for birthday, Valentine's day, Christmas or just for fun.
Surprise your friends by sending a favorite music, funny audio or your greeting audio record. Send a Audio-Gift to your friends for an occasion date.
Upload your greeting or funny video and send to your friend. Surprise and gave pleasant emotions to your friends or family on an occasion date or just like that.

Click "Add Audio" to select a audio file from your computer. After you have selected the audio, it will begin to upload right away. When your upload is finished, click the button below to save it, and go to next step - sending the gift to friends.

Please type your gift title and click on "Add Video" to select a video from your computer. After you have selected video, click on Post Video at the bottom to begin uploading the file. Please wait while your video is being uploaded. When your upload is finished, your video will be processed and then the gifts will be sent to selected friends.

Click "Add Photo" to select one photo from your computer. After you have selected the photo, it will begin to upload right away. When your upload is finished, click the button below your photo list to save it and continue to select recipients for your gift.

column1: HEGIFT_Have to install ffmpeg, contact with administrator of server.
column2: Video-Gifts are not available for now. Please contact Site Administration regarding to this issue.

column1: HEGIFT_Your %s gift successfully created, here you can select friends witch want to send this gift, then Send, for this click button below. If you decide not to send a gift and closed the page, do not worry your gift to be kept in %s
column2: Your %s gift has been successfully created. Please select friends to which you would like to this gift. This gift has been saved for you and locate here - %s, so you can send it later if you would like.
Select Friends and Send Your Gift

Below you can view gifts which you have created but have not sent yet. Please view the gifts details, send to friends or delete them. Please note that these gifts will be here for limited time period and then deleted.

column1: HEGIFT_Choose what kind of gift want to create: limitly or ...?
column2: You can set the number of available gifts or make them unlimited. It is one of ways to increase significance of gifts by limiting the available number of such gift, for example, 3 Red Rose Gift.

column1: HEGIFT_Maximum amount is 100 and minimum is 1, you can leave empty
column2: Please set the number of available gifts between 1 and 100.

Here you can view received gifts. Decline a gift if you want to remove it. If you would like to display a gift on your Profile page then just activate it. Note, only one gift can be active the same time.
Here you can view sent gifts - mouseover to check details.

column1: You are sending a gift to %s, if you would like to send a gift to other members too, then just close this filter - %s
column2: You are sending a gift to %s, if you would like to send a gift to other members too, then just close this filter - %s

Here you can browse virtual gifts, filter by name, type and category. Also you can enable/disable gifts if you don't like them to be sent or displayed on Browse Gifts page. Click on Edit link to edit details of the gift or duplicate the gift.
Please use the form below to edit the gift details. Check the menu options on right side for more options.
Please use the form below to edit the gift photos. Check the menu options on right side for more options.
Please check carefully all details of the gift. Please fill all fields of the form.

column1: You can manage photo, edit thumbnail, or upload other photo
column2: You can upload a new photo for this gift, edit its thumbnail which is displayed on activity feed and Member Profile Photo.
Create a copy of this gift, below you can view pre-filled form, edit them according to your needs. Please upload required photo which is not copied.

column1: HEGIFT_Photo is required for success creation of this gift
column2: Please upload photo, it is required to create this gift.

Please check carefully and fill all fields to successfully create a new gift.

Below you can create categories for gifts: Love, Birthday, Valentine's Day, etc. Category is required while you create new gifts. Members can browse gifts by categories - it makes easy to find needed gift.

These settings affect all members in your community.
If you are not sure about path to FFMPEG then please check Videos plugin settings where it is pre-filled or contact your Hosting Provider to get the path to FFMPEG. Note, it is FFMPEG is required for sending video-gifts.

column1: All gifts in the temporary being removed after the creation
column2: If a member creates a personal gift but doesn't send to friends then the gift is saved in Temporary(Saved) Gifts section. You can set lifetime in days for these gifts, as soon as lifetime expires these gifts will be removed. How many days we should store temporary gifts?
